attributes.action: shut down NHS private parking companies
attributes.additional_details:
staff being charged to work - 
patients being fleeced 
and extortion from greed
attributes.background: put an end to parking companies profiteering from land already funded by taxpayers of britain

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure whether you want to end charges for parking in all NHS car parks or only those operated by private companies.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

There's already a petition calling for an end to all hospital car parking charges, which you might like to sign. You're more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/240157
